title: Ticket #5997: Remove obsolete line from systemd configuration file
description: The systemd service file has an obsolete line for setting up a control group for the condor service. Systemd does this automatically now.
remarks:
2019-Apr-10 15:02:38 by pfc:
Is this still an issue? If so, what is the actual impact? I'm trying to judge the currency, urgency, and priority relative to other issues.

2019-Apr-10 15:10:44 by tim:
This was fixed. Resolving without review since it has been in use for years without issue.
